DOC.brief_summary: This study compare new nail `` INTERTAN '' Sliding Hip Screw treat specific group hipfractures ( trochanteric subtrochanteric fracture ) . Are differences term pain , early late functional mobility complication implant ( method operation ) ?
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Randomised Multicenter Study Comparing Sliding Hip Screw Intertan Nail Trochanteric Subtrochanteric Femoral Fractures
DOC.criteria: Patients older 60 year trochanteric subtrochanteric hip fracture . Patients pathologic fracture , patient already include fracture opposite side .
